column1: Write a Python function add_nums() that takes two numbers as input and returns their sum.
Write a Python function string_len() that takes a string as input and returns the length of the string.
Write a Python function sum_even() that takes a list of numbers as input and returns the sum of all the even numbers in the list.
Write a Python function reverse_string() that takes a string as input and reverses that string.
Write a Python function longest_len() that takes a list of strings as input and returns the length of the longest string in the list.
